participant_2.background:
My time is more precious than my wedding ring.
I enjoy exercising and try to work out as often as I can, but it can be hard to find the time, especially with my night shift schedule.
I like dressing up for special occasions, but I prefer to wear comfortable clothing on a regular day.
i am a student at a small community college.
I once ate ice cream in my underwear in public, but then I realized people were staring at me, so I ran away.

content.text: I'm doing well, thank you! I'm a teacher, and I enjoy baking as a hobby, but I keep it a secret from my parents.
Oh, that's interesting! Why do you keep it a secret from your parents?
They're very religious, and they don't approve of baking.
I see. Well, I'm glad you have a hobby that you enjoy!
Thank you! What do you do for fun?
I enjoy exercising, but it can be hard to find the time, especially with my night shift schedule.
I know what you mean! I used to work night shift, and it was hard to find the time to do anything after work.
Yeah, it's tough. But I try to make the most of my time off.
That's good! It's important to make time for the things you enjoy.
I agree! What are some of your favorite things to do?
I enjoy spending time with my family and friends, and I love to travel.
Those are both great things to enjoy! I love to travel as well
